name: re:group
tagline: Transform Your Brand, Grow Your Business
description: Founded in 2002 by Janet Muhleman, re:group is an award-winning integrated marketing agency located in Ann Arbor, Mich. re:group approaches each client challenge with an integrated marketing solution. Services offered include branding, marketing, advertising, design, social media, print, broadcast, website design, interactive, development, search engine optimization and traditional and digital media services.
